data.name: MembershipProviderConfig_MinNonAlphanumericCharacters.Text
data.value: Minimum No of Non AlphaNumeric Characters:

data.name: MembershipProviderConfig_RequiresQuestionAndAnswer.Help
data.value: Is a User supplied Question and Answer required to modify or retrieve a password

data.name: MembershipProviderConfig_MinPasswordLength.Help
data.value: The minimum number of characters required in a password

data.name: MembershipProviderConfig_MinNonAlphanumericCharacters.Help
data.value: The minimum number of non-alphanumeric characters required in a password.

data.name: MembershipProviderConfig_PasswordStrengthRegularExpression.Help
data.value: A regular expression to use to validate a password.

data.name: Records_PerPage.Help
data.value: Enter the number of users to display on a page

data.name: MembershipProviderConfig_MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts.Help
data.value: The maximum number of failed login attempts within a specified time window.

data.name: MembershipProviderConfig_PasswordAttemptWindow.Help
data.value: The time window (in minutes) for the maximim number of login attempts.

data.name: MembershipProviderConfig_PasswordResetEnabled.Help
data.value: Can the Administrator reset the user's password.

data.name: MembershipProviderConfig_PasswordRetrievalEnabled.Help
data.value: Can the User's password be retrieved.

data.name: PasswordConfig_PasswordExpiry.Help
data.value: The number of days before a User must change their password (value of 0 measn the password never expires)

data.name: ProviderSettingsHelp.Text
data.value: In this section you can review the membership provider's settings. Some providers may allow you to edit the settings. The default provider based on the ASP.NET MemberRole requires you to edit web.config, so the settings can not be updated here.

data.name: PasswordSettingsHelp.Text
data.value: You can set up Password aging settings in this section.

data.name: PasswordConfig_PasswordExpiryReminder.Help
data.value: The number of days warning the user will recieve that their password is about to expire.

data.name: Display_Mode.Help
data.value: Select the default display mode for the Users Grid

data.name: Security_CaptchaLogin.Help
data.value: Indicate whether this site should use CAPTCHA for Login

data.name: Security_CaptchaRegister.Help
data.value: Indicate whether this site should use CAPTCHA for Registration.

data.name: Redirect_AfterLogin.Help
data.value: You can select a page to redirect to after successful login

data.name: Redirect_AfterLogout.Help
data.value: You can select a page to redirect the user to, on logout.

data.name: Security_UsersControl.Text
data.value: Users display mode in Manage Roles

data.name: Security_UsersControl.Help
data.value: Select the Users Control to use in the Manage Roles module control

data.name: Redirect_AfterRegistration.Help
data.value: You can select a page to redirect the user to, on succesful registration.

data.name: Security_RequireValidProfile.Text
data.value: Require a valid Profile for Registration:

data.name: Security_RequireValidProfile.Help
data.value: You can optionally require that a new user enters a valid profile during registration.
